Posts.Content: May 30, 2008 09:26PM BethanyA wrote: Lisa, Thank you for responding to my post about also being recently diagnosed. I guess we get to walk down this road together and as I'm learning we are definately not alone in this journey.  My prayers will also be with you over this time.  Take time to take good care of yourself... friends will be here to laugh, yell, share, and cry together.  Hugs and God Bless.
Posts.Title: IDC diagnosis this week Lisa1965 Lisa1965
